TopicTitle: Anyone know about the Pyramid on the Mun?

Articles.Content: Found this while attempting to land at the Munar North Pole. Hadn't seen it on any of the Easter Egg lists going around.
It's not such much an easter egg as a flaw in the way the game generates terrain. Most worlds are weird at the poles. Most have mountains kind of like that, but Moho has pits.
Honestly I think it should be permanaent, its so cool!
I can confirm there's still a pyramid on Mun's north pole in v0.22.

I hope it can be blended in with the science messages, maybe subtly overarch alien references.

"The Goo seems to be waiting for something"

Unfortunately, I've lost all fuel around 300m above the nearby valley. The probe crashed and the only thing that remained was the Stayputnik core with a battery and solar panels. It works, but it can't do anything.

You should've seen the carnage. The impact was enough to dislodge everything, so there was a lot of debris rolling around. Goo, science, landing legs, batteries... lol.
WOW I like so much pyramids :)
Haha I recently landed there. I almost crashed. Almost. Such rough terrain.
